name: Grun
description:
---
YOUR GOAL IS TO KILL AND COLLECT SOULS.
SACRIFICE THEM TO BECOME STRONGER.
BE WARNED, IF YOU SACRIFICE YOUR SOULS, YOU'LL LOSE POINTS!!

TIP: YOU CAN USE YOUR GUN TO PROPEL YOURSELF IN THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION
---

CONTROLS:
ARROW KEYS - MOVEMENT
Z - JUMP
X - STAND STILL
C - SHOOT
V - STRAFE

W - TOGGLE FULLSCREEN

Game Created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5, sounds created using Bfxr.
